# [Interview #979: Reddit AMA 2013, Entry #63](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=979#63)

#### [TheFinisher4EverÂ ()](http://www.reddit.com/r/Fantasy/comments/1ced7z/iamstilla_novelist_named_brandon_sanderson_ama/c9fp8f8)

If you had to pick one of your worlds to live on, which would it be and why?

#### Brandon Sanderson

Probably Scadrial. Allomancy would be my chosen magic, and the technological progress appeals to me.
